SELECT tmp.id, tmp.is_coment_praise,
tcus.id AS topic_customer_id, tcus.nickname AS topic_customer_nickname, tcus.avatar_url AS topic_customer_avatar_url,
t.publish_time AS topic_publish_time, t.title AS topic_title, t.content AS topic_content, t.`status` AS topic_status, t.has_video AS topic_has_video, t.video_url AS topic_video_url, t.img_url AS topic_img_url, t.id AS topic_id,
img.foreign_id AS topic_img_id, img.iindex AS topic_img_index, img.img_url AS topic_img_img_url,
tccus.id AS topic_coment_customer_id, tccus.nickname AS topic_coment_customer_nickname, tccus.avatar_url AS topic_coment_customer_avatar_url,
tc.coment_time AS topic_coment_coment_time, tc.id AS topic_coment_id, tc.content AS topic_coment_content
FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT coment_thumbsup_id AS id, topic_coment.topic_id, topic_coment_id, coment_thumbsup.customer_id, thumbsup_time, 1 As is_coment_praise FROM coment_thumbsup LEFT JOIN topic_coment ON coment_thumbsup.topic_coment_id = topic_coment.id UNION ALL SELECT id, topic_id, NULL AS topic_coment_id, customer_id, thumbsup_time, 0 As is_coment_praise FROM topic_thumbsup )praise WHERE praise.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY thumbsup_time LIMIT #{page.start},#{page.pageSize} )tmp LEFT JOIN topic_coment tc ON tmp.topic_coment_id = tc.id LEFT JOIN topic t ON tmp.topic_id = t.id LEFT JOIN img ON img.`foreign_id` = t.id LEFT JOIN customer tcus ON t.customer_id = tcus.id #发帖人信息 LEFT JOIN customer tccus ON tc.customer_id = tccus.id #评论人信息 ORDER BY thumbsup_time DESC,img.iindex
